OpenCore-WebCore

WebCore plugin provides a framework and implementation to deploy Browser/Server structure application on OpenCore and OSGi.Clients could use this framework to create pure plugin-based web applications.

请参见：
          描述

软件包
javax.servlet The javax.servlet package contains a number of classes and interfaces that describe and define the contracts between a servlet class and the runtime environment provided for an instance of such a class by a conforming servlet container.
javax.servlet.http The javax.servlet.http package contains a number of classes and interfaces that describe and define the contracts between a servlet class running under the HTTP protocol and the runtime environment provided for an instance of such a class by a conforming servlet container.
org.opengoss.web.core Web Core to provide interfaces for web server, container and web plugin.
org.opengoss.web.internal Internal implementaion package.
org.opengoss.web.service REST style web service.
org.opengoss.web.service.annotation Annotations for REST style web service interface.
org.opengoss.web.service.meta Metadata information of REST style web service.

 

WebCore plugin provides a framework and implementation to deploy Browser/Server structure application on OpenCore and OSGi.Clients could use this framework to create pure plugin-based web applications.

In this framework, a web applications may contain one or more web plugins. Each Web plugin is an OpenCore plugin(or OSGi bundle) that provides static web pages and servlets, defines its own "WEB-INF/web.xml" file, implements a plugin activator that extends WebPluginActivator
